Title: Relates to fifth generation (5G) telecommunications towers in cities with a population of one million or more and electric vehicle charging stations
Summary: Requires anywhere fifth generation (5G) telecommunications towers in cities with a population of one million or more are installed, and there is available street parking, electric vehicle charging stations shall be provided for public use; defines terms; requires such charging stations to be designated and clearly identified.
LawCode: Add ยง1885, Pub Auth L; add ยง10-124, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the fifth generation (5G) telecommunications towers in cities with a population of one million or more and electric vehicle charging stations
